summary: This ancient blade is believed to have been lost during or just before the years of the Great War, but rumor has it the blade is aboard the wreck of the old Blades ship The Winter Wave. Will you brave the hold of this treacherous ship, in hopes of finding the ancient relic of the blades, Northwind?
descriptionHtml:
Now you can fight with Northwind, the newest weapon in your dragon fighting arsenal.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Northwind stats:

Base Damage: 13
Weight: 10
Enchantment: Does 35 points of extra damage to dragons and 5 points of Frost damage for 10 seconds to others.

Also includes new Blades Grand Master Armor (Male & Female)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This ancient blade is believed to have been lost during or just before the years of the Great War, but rumor has it the blade is aboard the wreck of the old Blades ship The Winter Wave. Will you brave the hold of this treacherous ship, in hopes of finding the ancient relic of the blades, Northwind?
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

author: HeirOfTheSeptems
